name: Text Test
description:
This started out as a test. Which totally means it still is a test and you should not expect a game out of this.

If it would be a game (which it obviously isn't), it would contain psychological tricks to make you regret decisions no matter which one you pick. It would also be a demo.

Too bad it's not a game, though. Because if it would, we would probably also be planning on making a full version.

If the sounds don't sound good, lower the volume. Sorry about that.
